mapper.select: select concat(op.product_name, ' _ ', op.color) from reviews r join order_products op on r.order_product_id = op.order_product_id where review_id = #{reviewId}

select p.amount, p.reason, op.product_name as productName from point p join reviews r on p.review_id = r.review_id join order_products op on r.order_product_id = p.order_product_id where user_id = #{userId}
